attributes.action: Give children truly equal parents and bring back common sense to parenting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1.Automatic parental responsibility for fathers & 50/50 care, parents encouraged to work together.
2.Parental alienation treated as child abuse.
3.No personal financial gain from seperation or childcare.
4.Financial status returned to the state prior to the separation, taking into account prior assets, contributions, loss of skills etc.
5.Encourage parents to educate themselves and/or seek employment.
6.Childs right to a equal parents supersedes the rights of either parent. Any parent moving away, leaving the country etc has the duty to ensure that the relationship with the other parent is maintained. 
7.Where either parent carries any portion of the other parents responsibility, be it financial, or care time; this should be compensated for proportionately as Child support.

government_responses.details:

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
